LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.PawnMassCapacity.Title: Pawns: Mass capacity multiplier
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.PawnMassCapacity.Desc: Multiplier used to calculate how much a pawn can carry.\nBody size * this = capacity in kg.\nDefault is 35.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.PodMassCapacity.Title: Transport Pods: Mass capacity
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.PodMassCapacity.Desc: Maximum mass that each transport pod can hold.\nDefault is 150.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.PodFuelPerTile.Title: Transport Pods: Fuel per tile
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.PodFuelPerTile.Desc: How much fuel is used per tile travelled.\nDefault is 2.25.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.DebugMode.Title: Debug Mode
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Meals.Title: Stack Size: Meals
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Meals.Desc: Any type of meal.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Food.Title: Stack Size: Food
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Food.Desc: Raw meats, vegetables, eggs, milk, etc.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.AnimalFeed.Title: Stack Size: Animal Feed
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.AnimalFeed.Desc: Hay, kibble, etc.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Textiles.Title: Stack Size: Textiles
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Textiles.Desc: Cloths, wools, and leathers.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Medicine.Title: Stack Size: Medicine
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Medicine.Desc: Medicines and healing kits.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Drugs.Title: Stack Size: Drugs
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Drugs.Desc: Drugs and beer.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Manufactured.Des: Components, shells, chemfuel, Neutroamine, etc.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Silver.Title: Stack Size: Silver
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Silver.Desc: Basic resource, separated because it is used as money.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Resources.Title: Stack Size: Raw Resources
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Resources.Desc: Metals, stone blocks, non-food plant matter, etc.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Chunks.Title: Stack Size: Chunks
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Chunks.Desc: Chunks of stone or steel slag\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Artifacts.Title: Stack Size: Artifacts
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Artifacts.Desc: Psychic lance, soother, etc.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.BodyParts.Title: Stack Size: Body Parts
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.BodyParts.Desc: Bionic and natural body parts, organs, and implants.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Misc.Title: Stack Size: Miscellaneous
LanguageData.WobCapacityLimits.Stack.Misc.Desc: Horns, tusks, mech serums, and anything else that doesn't fit in any other category.\nStack limit is multiplied by this number.
